constants.description: To accommodate Campaign values that are wrongly populated without the hyphen
constants.name: constExpoWithoutHyphen

constants.description: User ID for JT Keenan - After Hour Appointment Manager
constants.name: constJTUserID

constants.description: ID of the public group 'SDR - Stateside'.
constants.name: constSDRStatesidePGId

decisions.description: Branch to Get Lead or Account Record once again - For instances when the User clicks Previous from the final screen (Post Update Record Operation) and changes the Owner again
decisions.name: Current_Lead_or_Account
decisions.label: Current Lead or Account

decisions.description: Change Owner to After Hour Manager or SDR Queue based on user input
decisions.name: Owner_Check
decisions.label: Owner Check

decisions.description: Only if the user belongs to the Public group 'SDR - Stateside', show them the option for After hour Appointment.
decisions.name: SDR_location_check
decisions.label: SDR location check

formulas.description: Returns - Issue 1099 Payee or Issue 1099 if present
formulas.name: formCampaignIssue1099Payee
formDunBradPackageName
formulas.expression: IF({!formLeadSource}= {!constDunBradstreet}, IF(CONTAINS({!formLeadTypeNewText}, "Manager" ), "Portfolio Manager", IF(CONTAINS({!formLeadTypeNewText}, "Credit Insights" ), "Credit Insights", IF(CONTAINS({!formLeadTypeNewText}, "Credit Primary" ), "Credit Primary", IF(CONTAINS({!formLeadTypeNewText}, "Credit Signal" ), "Credit Signal","")))),"")

formulas.description: Returns True if Owner is SDR Queue, General Lead Queue or Dead Leads Queue
formulas.name: formEligibleOwner
formulas.expression: OR( LEFT({!formOwnerId},15) = '005PJ000000080n', /*SDR Queue*/ LEFT({!formOwnerId},15) = '005f100000HXqaD', /*GLQ*/ LEFT({!formOwnerId},15) = '005j000000DDBst') /*Dead Leads Queue*/

formulas.description: If Entity Tax Classification is blank or 'Undetermined', return 'Business', else return Entity Tax Classification.
formulas.name: formEntityTypeOrBusiness
formFloRegAddOnText
formulas.expression: IF({!formLeadSource} = "Florida Registrations", " with the State of Florida.",".")

formulas.name: formIncAuthPackageName
formulas.expression: IF({!formLeadSource}= {!constIncAuthority}, IF(CONTAINS({!formLeadTypeNewText}, "Fast Track" ), "Fast Track package", IF(CONTAINS({!formLeadTypeNewText}, "Starter" ), "Starter package", IF(CONTAINS({!formLeadTypeNewText}, "Express" ), "Express package", IF(CONTAINS({!formLeadTypeNewText}, "Operating Agreement" ), "Operating Agreement package", IF(CONTAINS({!formLeadTypeNewText}, "Buyer" ), "Buyer package", IF(CONTAINS({!formLeadTypeNewText}, "Basic" ), "Basic package","")))))),"")

formulas.description: Returns the Lead Source of Lead or Account
formulas.name: formLeadSource

formulas.description: Returns Owner Id of the Lead Or Account (after any recent updates)
formulas.name: formOwnerId

formulas.description: If user chooses After-Hour Manager, return JTKeenan's user Id. Else if the owner is not SDR Queue, GLQ or Dead Leads Queue, return SDR Queue Id
formulas.name: formOwnerIdToUpdate

formulas.description: If Registered Agent is blank, return blank, else return "with {Registered Agent}"
formulas.name: formWithRegisteredAgent

recordLookups.description: Get the Event created in the previous Screen.
recordLookups.name: Recent_Event_Details
recordLookups.label: Recent Event Details

recordLookups.description: Check if the User belongs to the SDR - Stateside Public group
recordLookups.name: SDR_Stateside_Group_Member
recordLookups.label: SDR-Stateside Group Member

screens.description: LS = 1800A and Campaign contains Issue1099 or Outbound - SMB Expo
screens.name: DirectInc_Issue1099
screens.label: DirectInc Issue1099 Expo

fields.name: Display_Owner_Updated
fields.fieldText: Owner has been updated

value.stringValue: Click Launch when the call is answered

textTemplates.name: Template_1800A_Primary
textTemplates.text:
Hello, this is {!$User.FirstName} with 1-800Accountant. Just a quick note, this call is being recorded for quality and training purposes.


The reason Im reaching out is it appears you may have recently shown some interest in our accounting services and as a courtesy, we wanted to extend to you a no-fee tax consultation that covers IRS compliance and bookkeeping strategies.


We'll also go over other important topics such as your Entity Classification Election, looming deadlines, potential deductions, and the new tax law that was enacted this year.


If you have about 30 minutes now, I can get you speaking to the right person to get this taken care of for you.

<<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


ONLY IF THEY ASK for more details on this new rule, you can reply with this:

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


If they say no to a LIVE, then follow up with one of the following in this order:

  • Okay, what time later today or tomorrow works for you?
  • If they still say no I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember: it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?

textTemplates.name: Template_AfterHour_Manager
textTemplates.text: If this is an AFTER HOUR Appointment request, set toggle to 'After-Hour Appt' (This will change record owner to After-Hour Manager)

textTemplates.name: Template_BTP
textTemplates.text:
Hello, this is {!$User.FirstName} with {!formLeadSource}s accounting partner, 1-800Accountant. Just a quick note, this call is being recorded for quality and training purposes.


We are the company that will be filing your Business taxes. We need to schedule your consultation where well go over important topics such as your Entity Classification Election, looming deadlines, potential deductions, and the new tax law that was enacted this year.


I do have a Tax Specialist available now if you have about 30 minutes so we can get this taken care of for you <<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


(ONLY IF THEY ASK for more details on this new rule, you can reply with this):

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


If they say no to a LIVE, then follow up with one of the following in this order:

  • Okay, what time later today or tomorrow works for you?
  • If they still say no I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember: it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?

textTemplates.name: Template_DirectInc_AnnualRep
textTemplates.text:
Hello - This is {!$User.FirstName} with 1-800Accountant calling on a recorded line. Included with your Annual Report purchase with DirectIncorporation is an urgent no-fee tax consultation we still owe you.

  

We need to schedule your consultation to go over IRS compliance requirements, your Entity Classification Election, looming deadlines, and also the new tax law that was enacted this year.


I do have a Tax Specialist available now if you have about 30 minutes so we can get this taken care of for you <<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


ONLY IF THEY ASK for more details on this new rule, you can reply with this:

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


If they say no to a LIVE, then follow up with one of the following in this order:

  • Okay, what time later today or tomorrow works for you?
  • If they still say no I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember: it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?

textTemplates.name: Template_DunBrad_ADP
textTemplates.text:

We'll also go over other important topics such as your Entity Classification Election, looming deadlines, the new tax law that was enacted this year and potential deductions which may wind up saving you thousands of dollars.


If you have about 30 minutes now, I can get you speaking to the right person to get this taken care of for you.

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.

textTemplates.name: Template_Generic
textTemplates.text:
Use this template for any former partners. EXAMPLES: Swyft Filings, Legal Zoom, FileNow, MVF Global, MyCompanyWorks, etc ( NEVER mention these companies by name)


Hello - This is {!$User.FirstName} with 1-800Accountant calling on a recorded line. Were calling you about your recent business formation which entitles you to a no-fee tax consultation. We provide this service to all new businesses.


We'll go over IRS compliance requirements, your Entity Classification Election, deadlines that may be coming up, plus the new law that was just implemented as of January 1st - Youre going to want to learn more about that as it is affecting most small businesses


I do have a Tax Specialist available now if you have about 30 minutes so we can get this taken care of for you <<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


(IF THEY ASK for more details on this new rule, you can reply with this):

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.

textTemplates.name: Template_Issue1099_Payee
textTemplates.text:
Hello- This is {!$User.FirstName} with 1-800Accountant, calling on a recorded line.


Campaign Issue1099 Payee: We noticed that you just recently received a 1099 via email through 1-800accountant. Just so you are aware, in the eyes of IRS, you are an owner of a small business, so the next step is to schedule your Tax Savings consultation to ensure you are taking advantage of any potential deductions available to you.


We'll go over IRS compliance requirements, your ECE, deadlines that may be coming up, plus the new law that was just implemented as of January 1st - Youre going to want to learn more about that as it is affecting most small businesses


I do have a Tax Specialist available now if you have about 30 minutes so we can get this taken care of for you <<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


ONLY IF THEY ASK for more details on this new rule, you can reply with this:

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


If they say no to a LIVE, then follow up with one of the following in this order:

  • Okay, what time later today or tomorrow works for you?
  • If they still say no I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember: it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?

textTemplates.name: Template_Issue_1099
textTemplates.text:

textTemplates.name: Template_Live_Transfer_Rep_Note
textTemplates.text:
*For all LIVE TRANSFERS*

You MUST confirm if they have a partner or not. If they do, the partner MUST be available to join the call, or a LIVE cannot be transferred.

If they have a partner, and the partner is unavailable, you must set the appointment for a different time/date and they will need to invite the partner to the call.

textTemplates.name: Template_Mylo_Primary
textTemplates.text:
Hello - This is {!$User.FirstName} with 1-800Accountant calling on a recorded line.


The reason Im reaching out is to schedule your no-cost tax consultation as part of the insurance package you purchased. 


We'll go over important topics such as your Entity Classification, looming deadlines, the new tax law that was enacted this year, and potential deductions which may wind up saving you thousands of dollars.

textTemplates.name: Template_NewBusiness
textTemplates.text:
Hello - This is {!$User.FirstName} with 1-800Accountant calling on a recorded line. Were calling you about the {!formEntityTypeOrBusiness} you recently registered {!formWithRegisteredAgent}. We provide a no-cost tax consultation for all new business owners.


During this educational call, well review IRS compliance requirements, your Entity Classification Election, and deadlines you now face throughout the year. Our goal is to identify tax strategies and deductions that will save you thousands annually.


Are you available for 30 minutes now to speak with a tax specialist?

<<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


(IF THEY ASK for more details on this new rule, you can reply with this):

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


If they say no to a LIVE, then follow up with one of the following in this order:

  • Okay, what time later today or tomorrow works for you?
  • If they still say no I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember: it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?

textTemplates.name: Template_NewBusiness_NoShow_Cancelled
textTemplates.text:
Hello! This is {!$User.FirstName} with 1-800Accountant, calling on a recorded line. It looks like we weren't able to connect for our previously scheduled appointment on {!No_Show_Cancelled_Appts.StartDateTime}.


If you recall, your business formation {!formWithRegisteredAgent} entitled you to a no-fee tax consultation. Well go over IRS compliance requirements, your Entity Classification Election, any looming deadlines, plus the new law that was just implemented in January.  


If you have about 30 minutes, we can get that taken care of for you now.

<<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


[Whether they agree to be TRANSFERRED LIVE or ASK FOR A RESCHEDULE REAFFIRM URGENCY!!]

Remember, the reason this call is important is because we go over IRS compliance requirements, your ECE, plus the new law that was implemented at the beginning of the year.  


[IF THEY ASK for more details on the new law, reply with this]

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


[IF THE Client does NOT agree to a LIVE transfer]  Okay, if youre busy now, how about later today or sometime tomorrow?


[IF THE Client does NOT agree to a later day/tomorrow appointment]  I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?

textTemplates.name: Template_NoShow_Cancelled
textTemplates.text:
Hello - This is {!$User.FirstName} with 1-800Accountant, calling on a recorded line. 


It looks like we werent able to connect for our previously scheduled appointment on {!No_Show_Cancelled_Appts.StartDateTime}. Since it does cover important information, wed like to get that back on your calendar.


If you have 30 minutes now, I can get you transferred right over and we can get this taken care of for you now <<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


[Whether they agree to be TRANSFERRED LIVE or ASK FOR A RESCHEDULE REAFFIRM URGENCY!!]

As a reminder, well be going over IRS compliance requirements, your Entity Classification Election, any looming deadlines, and the new law that was just implemented in January. 


[IF THEY ASK for more details on the new law, reply with this]

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


[IF THE Client does NOT agree to a LIVE transfer]  Okay, if youre busy now, how about later today or sometime tomorrow?


[IF THE Client does NOT agree to a later day/tomorrow appointment]  I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?

textTemplates.name: Template_Set_Appointment
textTemplates.text:
ONCE APPT HAS BEEN SET

Okay, to confirm youre in the {!formClientTimezone} time zone, right? 

And is this the best number to reach you?  

And the email address I have on file for you is {!formClientEmail} - Is that correct?


Alright, do you have any business partners?  

ONLY if they say yes, reply with: Please be sure to invite your partner(s) to this call. This will be important to them as well.


Okay great, I am sending you an email confirmation now, and youll receive a courtesy text message about one hour before your scheduled time.  

Youre going to want to have something to take some notes with because they will be sharing with you a lot of important information.  

If you are near your computer during the call, they can send you a link for a screen share, if youd like to follow along.


Okay, I have put your appointment on our tax specialist's calendar for 30 minutes. Can you foresee any reason why you would not be able to attend the call?

(ONLY IF THEY SAY YES...  reply with the following and reschedule):

Okay, if this time we picked is a concern, lets find another time that would work better for you.


Okay, Just to confirm, I have your appointment on {!Recent_Event_Details.Local_Start_Time__c}. 

Thank you and have a great rest of your day!

textTemplates.name: Template_SMB_Expo
textTemplates.text:
Hello, I'm {!$User.FirstName} from 1-800accountant calling on a recorded line. I'm giving you a call today because all business owners who registered at the Small Business Expo in New York City on May 2nd, are entitled to a no-fee tax consultation. 


We will go over deadlines that are time sensitive, such as the BOI (Beneficial Ownership information) filing that was implemented this year, your Entity Classification Election, and any looming deadlines. 


We'll also go over some important deductions that could possibly save you thousands this year. The consultation only takes about 30 minutes and I can get you talking to a Tax Specialist now.


<<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


(ONLY IF THEY ASK for more details on this new rule, you can reply with this):

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


If they say no to a LIVE, then follow up with one of the following in this order:

  • Okay, what time later today or tomorrow works for you?
  • If they still say no I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember: it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?

textTemplates.name: Template_TailorBrands
textTemplates.text:
Hello, this is {!$User.FirstName} with {!formLeadSource}s accounting partner, 1-800Accountant. Just a quick note, this call is being recorded for quality and training purposes


I'm reaching out because we haven't yet scheduled your tax consultation, which was included as part of your original business formation with {!formLeadSource}. We'll go over important topics such as IRS compliance requirements, your ECE, looming deadlines, potential deductions, and also go over the new tax law that was enacted this year.  


I do have a Tax Specialist available now if you have about 30 minutes so we can get this taken care of for you <<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


(ONLY IF THEY ASK for more details on this new rule, you can reply with this):

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


If they say no to a LIVE, then follow up with one of the following in this order:

  • Okay, what time later today or tomorrow works for you?
  • If they still say no I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember: it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?

textTemplates.name: Template_Tax_Hotline
textTemplates.text:
Hello, this is {!$User.FirstName} with {!formLeadSource}s accounting partner, 1-800Accountant. Just a quick note, this call is being recorded for quality and training purposes.  


Your original Tax Hotline Service package purchase also came with a no-cost tax consultation. I'm reaching out to get that scheduled. 


We'll go over important topics such as your Entity Classification Election, looming deadlines, potential deductions, and the new tax law that was enacted this year.  


(ONLY IF THEY ASK for more details about the TAX HOTLINE service):

The Tax Hotline service gives you the ability to set an appointment through Zen where you can get a limited session with an accountant. It was part of the package you purchased.


I have our Tax Specialist available now if you have about 30 minutes so we can get this taken care of for you <<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


(ONLY IF THEY ASK for more details on this new rule, you can reply with this):

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


If they say no to a LIVE, then follow up with one of the following in this order:

  • Okay, what time later today or tomorrow works for you?
  • If they still say no I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember: it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?

textTemplates.name: Template_UENI
textTemplates.text:
Hello - This is {!$User.FirstName} with 1-800Accountant calling on a recorded line. We're accounting partners with {!formLeadSource}, the company working on your website. We're calling to schedule your no-fee tax consultation that's included in your service.


You may not know this, but the website package you purchased for your business may be 100% tax deductible, so this call will help you get even more out of your original investment. 


We'll go over important topics such as your Entity Classification Election, looming deadlines, the new tax law that was enacted this year, and potential deductions which may wind up saving you thousands of dollars.


If you have about 30 minutes now, I can get you speaking to the right person to get this taken care of for you. <<<WAIT FOR THEM TO SPEAK>>>


(ONLY IF THEY ASK for more details on this new rule, you can reply with this):

As of January 1, most U.S. companies must report detailed ownership information under the Corporate Transparency Act. This rule significantly impacts 97% of small business owners. Our tax specialist can go in more detail on that for you.


If they say no to a LIVE, then follow up with one of the following in this order:

  • Okay, what time later today or tomorrow works for you?
  • If they still say no I know time can be scarce, but this consultation is designed to help protect your investment- were going to provide you with a lot of valuable information and remember: it does come at no additional cost, as it was part of your original business formation, so what time works best for you?
